author: diguida
body:
This is needed to make the `HCalCalPedestal` producer run in the AlCaReco matrix for data.

Concerning changes of #10054 : 
- https://github.com/mmusich/cmssw/commit/05d53c5a1e63039906a1a74e22ae22eb6b9b5d46 is already included by #8350 apart from the cleanup of `Configuration/StandardSequences/python/AlCaRecoStream_Specials_cff.py` for multiple inclusions of AlcaReco DQM instances.
- https://github.com/mmusich/cmssw/commit/54cfd3a88aac8be11cacb01b1af77125a6cb5c70 is cherry-picked.

The three commits of the final fix for `HcalCalPedestal` in #10498 (featuring a fix of the module names in the AlCaReco and the selection of the correct output collections, as well as a test cfg) are cherry-picked.
title: Complete fix for HcalCalPedestal AlCaReco (75X)
